meanings.definition: Make a characteristic high-pitched sound, as a horse.
meanings.sent1: The horse neighs loudly in the field.
meanings.sent2: She loves to hear the horses neigh in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The horse neighs happily when it sees its favorite treat.
meanings.sent4: The neighs of the horse echoed through the quiet valley.
meanings.sent5: As the sun rose, the horse neighs signaled the start of a new day.

meanings.definition: The characteristic high-pitched sound made by a horse.
meanings.sent1: I heard the loud neighs of the horse from afar.
meanings.sent2: The neighs of the horses added to the farm's atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The neighs of the horse sounded like a cheerful greeting.
meanings.sent4: The neighs of the horse were music to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The sudden neighs of the horse startled the children playing nearby.
